name: SENZO
description:
As a web technologies specialist, SENZO is an independent digital agency located near Paris. SENZO realizes original and innovative online application solutions by combining creativity, design, and new technologies.
We have been working in the web business for more than 12 years and have worked on more than 100 projects on behalf of SMEs, entrepreneurs and large international groups in many different sectors. Our areas of expertise are branding as well as website, mobile, and e-commerce development.
